General.Name: GSS Infotech Limited
General.Description: GSS Infotech Limited provides information technology (IT) services and solutions in India, Bangladesh, and the United States. The company provides consulting services comprising professional; digital transformation, such as agile and DevOps, API platform, enterprise platform management, and big data; application services, including application development, transformation, and maintenance services, as well as Quality Engineering solutions; and managed services, which include network operations center, security operations center, data center, and storage infrastructure services. It also offers applied intelligence solutions, such as artificial intelligence, data science and machine learning, Internet of Things, and automation; enterprise security solutions, including digital identity governance, application security, and cyber security services; and cloud solutions, such as cloud infrastructure, cloud migration, and hybrid cloud management services. In addition, the company offers TruVu, a data visualization and simplification platform; UniDesk, a cloud-based service desk for IT infrastructure; and ibStream, a mobile marketing solution. It serves government, telecom, cloud, and healthcare sectors, as well as small, medium, and large businesses. The company was formerly known as GSS America Infotech Limited and changed its name to GSS Infotech Limited in March 2011. GSS Infotech Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
General.Address: N Heights, Plot No. 12, Hyderabad, India, 500081
